tourBios.curYrHigh: Finished T14 at the Mainland China Qualifying Tournament in early March at Wolong Lake GC in Liuzhou. Tied with Xiao Yi Mo, Yi Yuan Mi and Hao Chuan Wu, so the quartet had a playoff to determine the final two fully-exempt playing spots for the PGA TOUR China Series' season. Earned the final card among the two available when he chipped in for birdie on the third extra hole.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA Tour China Serie was T80th in 2015 at the Yulongwan Yunnan Open.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T48th in Total Eagles on the PGA Tour China Series.
